observation_location.full: Heath Hill Rd, Brushton, New York

current_observation.observation_time: Last Updated on April 1, 7:19 AM EDT

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Moderating temperatures will change morning snow showers to rain showers by late day. High 39F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers this afternoon. High 4C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 23F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near -5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 52F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 11C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain developing after midnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 42F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain ending overnight. Low 32F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of rain early. Low around 0C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 50F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High around 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 42F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 6C. ENE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
